description: This notification indicates that the vectoring service on the board fails.

description: A slot index is used to identify the location of a board in a shelf.
You can locate a board in a shelf according to hwFrameIndex and hwSlotIndex.
For the hwFrameIndex object, refer to hwFrameTable.
variables.name: HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwSlotIndex

description: This notification indicates that the vectoring service on the board recovers.

description: A slot index is used to identify the location of a board in a shelf.
You can locate a board in a shelf according to hwFrameIndex and hwSlotIndex.
For the hwFrameIndex object, refer to hwFrameTable.

description: The index of a shelf in the device.
variables.name: HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwFrameIndex

description: A slot index is used to identify the location of a board in a shelf.
You can locate a board in a shelf according to hwFrameIndex and hwSlotIndex.
For the hwFrameIndex object, refer to hwFrameTable.
variables.name: HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwSlotIndex

description: Port index, indicating the physical number of the port on a board.
variables.name: HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwPortIndex

description: Options:
1. vectoring(1) - The CPE type is vectoring
2. fullFriendly(2) - The CPE type is vectoring full friendly
3. friendlyDs(3) - The CPE type is vectoring friendly ds
4. legacyVdsl2(4) - The CPE type is vdsl2
5. adsl(5) - The CPE type is adsl/2/2+
6. unknown(6) - The CPE type is unknown
variables.name: HUAWEI-VECTOR-MIB::hwVectoringLinkCPEType

description: Vectoring legacy cpe activate policy.
Default values:limit.
Options:
1. no-limit(1) - The legacy cpe is allowed to activated in G.993.2 operation mode
2. block(2) - The legacy cpe is not allowed to activated in G.993.2 operation mode
3. limit(3) - The legacy cpe is allowed to activated in G.993.2 operation mode,
with PSD auto shaped to eliminate the self-FEXT to vectoring lines
4. forceFriendlyDsLimitUs(4) - Force friendly is used in the downstream direction, and PSD automatic
shaping is used in the upstream direction
5. forceFriendlyDsNoLimitUs(5) - Force friendly is used in the downstream direction, and no restriction
is set for the upstream direction
variables.name: HUAWEI-VECTOR-MIB::hwVectoringLegacyCpeActivatePolicy

description: This notification indicates that the port frequently retrain times in
15 minutes reach the threshold.

event.Summary: Port $v3 retrain count in 15 minutes reached threshold

description: This notification indicates that the vectoring global configuration is changed.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-VECTOR-MIB::hwVectoringGlobalConfigChangeTrap HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwConfigChangeIP a 192.0.2.1 HUAWEI-VECTOR-MIB::hwVectoringSwitch i 1 HUAWEI-VECTOR-MIB::hwVectoringLegacyCpeActivatePolicy i 1 HUAWEI-VECTOR-MIB::hwVectoringBandplanType i 1 HUAWEI-VECTOR-MIB::hwVectoringUs0Type i -1 HUAWEI-VECTOR-MIB::hwVectoringAnnexALimitMask i -1 HUAWEI-VECTOR-MIB::hwVectoringLegacyCpeReservedBand s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-VECTOR-MIB::hwVectoringLegacyCpeToneBlackoutBand s EXAMPLE

description: The serial IP of configuration changes.
If the configuration changes is trigger by the command line users, the IP address is 0.0.0.0.
If it is triggered by the SNMP user, the IP address is the SNMP user's IP address.
The Trap of configuration changes will not be sent to the SNMP user
who triggered the configuration changes.
variables.name: HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwConfigChangeIP

description: Enable/Disable the global vectoring configuration.
Default values:disable.
Options:
1. enable(1) - Enables the global vectoring configuration
2. disable(2) - Disables the global vectoring configuration
variables.name: HUAWEI-VECTOR-MIB::hwVectoringSwitch

description: Vectoring legacy cpe activate policy.
Default values:limit.
Options:
1. no-limit(1) - The legacy cpe is allowed to activated in G.993.2 operation mode
2. block(2) - The legacy cpe is not allowed to activated in G.993.2 operation mode
3. limit(3) - The legacy cpe is allowed to activated in G.993.2 operation mode,
with PSD auto shaped to eliminate the self-FEXT to vectoring lines
4. forceFriendlyDsLimitUs(4) - Force friendly is used in the downstream direction, and PSD automatic
shaping is used in the upstream direction
5. forceFriendlyDsNoLimitUs(5) - Force friendly is used in the downstream direction, and no restriction
is set for the upstream direction
variables.name: HUAWEI-VECTOR-MIB::hwVectoringLegacyCpeActivatePolicy

description: Vectoring global frequency plan types.
Default values:bandplan998ade.
Options:
1. bandplanAnnexa(1) - The frequency plan types for the vectoring feature is Annex A
2. bandplanAnnexc(2) - The frequency plan types for the vectoring feature is Annex C
3. bandplan997e(3) - The frequency plan types for the vectoring feature is 997E
4. bandplan998ade(4) - The frequency plan types for the vectoring feature is 998ADE
5. bandplan998e(5) - The frequency plan types for the vectoring feature is 998E
6. bandplanHPE(6) - The frequency plan types for the vectoring feature is HPE
variables.name: HUAWEI-VECTOR-MIB::hwVectoringBandplanType

description: Vectoring us0 type.
Default values:us0TypeA.
Options:
1. us0TypeA(1) - US0 type is US0-type A
2. us0TypeB(2) - US0 type is US0-type B
3. us0TypeM(3) - US0 type is US0-type M
4. us0TypeN(4) - US0 type is US0-type N/A
5. invalidValue(-1) - US0 type return -1 when vectoring frequency plan types is Annex A/Annex C
variables.name: HUAWEI-VECTOR-MIB::hwVectoringUs0Type

description: AnnexA limit mask.
Options:
1. d32(1) - AnnexA limit mask is D-32
2. d48(2) - AnnexA limit mask is D-48
3. d64(3) - AnnexA limit mask is D-64
4. d128(4) - AnnexA limit mask is D-128
5. invalidValue(-1) - AnnexA limit mask return -1 when vectoring frequency plan types is not Annex A
variables.name: HUAWEI-VECTOR-MIB::hwVectoringAnnexALimitMask

description: This object is used to set the reserved band of a legacy CPE.
This object takes effect when hwVectoringLegacyCpeActivatePolicy is set to limit.
Range of the subcarrier IDs: 0-6956. Two subcarriers are separated by a comma (,).
The format is: start subcarrier ID-end subcarrier ID.
The start subcarrier ID cannot be greater than the end subcarrier ID.
Only eight reserved band is supported, for example, 880-900,1000-1100.
The settings of hwVectoringLegacyCpeReservedBand and
hwVectoringLegacyCpeToneBlackoutBand cannot overlap with each other.
variables.name: HUAWEI-VECTOR-MIB::hwVectoringLegacyCpeReservedBand

description: This object is used to set the blackout band of a legacy CPE.
This object takes effect when hwVectoringLegacyCpeActivatePolicy is set to limit.
Range of the subcarrier IDs: 0-6956. Two subcarriers are separated by a comma (,).
The format is: start subcarrier ID-end subcarrier ID.
The start subcarrier ID cannot be greater than the end subcarrier ID.
Only eight tone blackout band is supported, for example, 1300-1320,1400-1500.
The settings of hwVectoringLegacyCpeReservedBand and
hwVectoringLegacyCpeToneBlackoutBand cannot overlap with each other.
variables.name: HUAWEI-VECTOR-MIB::hwVectoringLegacyCpeToneBlackoutBand

description: This notification indicates that the vectoring crosstalk coupling matrix calculation result.

Summary.eval: ($v4 == 1) ? 'Crosstalk coupling matrix operation result is normal' : 'Crosstalk coupling matrix operation result is fail'

tests: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-VECTOR-MIB::hwVectoringCrosstalkCoupingMatrixOperResultTrap HUAWEI-XDSL-COMMON-MIB::hwXdslRequestID i 9999 IF-MIB::ifIndex i 9999 HUAWEI-VECTOR-MIB::hwVectoringCrosstalkCouplingMatrixDirection i 1 HUAWEI-VECTOR-MIB::hwVectoringCrosstalkCoupingMatrixOperResult i 2

$SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-VECTOR-MIB::hwVectoringCrosstalkCoupingMatrixOperResultTrap HUAWEI-XDSL-COMMON-MIB::hwXdslRequestID i 9999 IF-MIB::ifIndex i 9999 HUAWEI-VECTOR-MIB::hwVectoringCrosstalkCouplingMatrixDirection i 1 HUAWEI-VECTOR-MIB::hwVectoringCrosstalkCoupingMatrixOperResult i 1

description: Request ID.
variables.name: HUAWEI-XDSL-COMMON-MIB::hwXdslRequestID

description: A unique value, greater than zero, for each interface. It
is recommended that values are assigned contiguously
starting from 1. The value for each interface sub-layer
must remain constant at least from one re-initialization of
the entity's network management system to the next re-
initialization.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifIndex

description: The direction of the vectoring crosstalk coupling matrix
either upstream or downstream.
variables.name: HUAWEI-VECTOR-MIB::hwVectoringCrosstalkCouplingMatrixDirection

description: This object identifies the crosstalk coupling matrix operation result.
Options:
1. normal(1) - The crosstalk coupling matrix operation result is normal.
2. fail(2) - The crosstalk coupling matrix operation result is fail.
variables.name: HUAWEI-VECTOR-MIB::hwVectoringCrosstalkCoupingMatrixOperResult
